thread.section_title: AMOMA.com Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von AMOMA.com | www.amoma.com
thread.title: Rass

author: Rass
title: Rass
text:
In Praha we stayed in the Ramada Palace Hotel at the Wenzels Place: Big, and delicious breakfast, nice and great suite and a hotel which enables you to see a lot of Praha's downtown by foot. The hotel has also a garage. There are innumerable restaurants and bars nearby
In Berlin we stayed in the ADINA Hotel in the Hackeschen Markets. Very modern house not far away the Alexander Place where you can get all the objects of interest either by foot or easily using S- or U-Bahn. The hotels offers also a garage. The breakfast was perfect, you can get everything and if you can't find something at the buffet the nicest crew will help you and prepare it as you want. The room was very new and modern furnished the bed was comfortable the bathroom large and best equipped. Around the hotel you'll find a lot of good bars and restaurants. I can strongly recommend the hotel to everybody.
